games.title: Virtual Roach Races
games.about:
Prepare yourself for the worlds first photorealistic rendered cock roach race contest. Pick your roach and watch them compete to finish line glory (well for the roaches, that make it of course!).
The virtual race is live rendered with digital 3D action and RNG based.

Our contests support all the established markets (including Win, Forecast, Reverse Forecast, Tricast and Reverse Tricast).

Our virtual contests are high frequency, with a new race every 2 to 3 minutes, a 24/7 dedicated channel and seamless odds integration. The game logic behind each virtual race is fully adaptable to regulatory frameworks.

games.title:
Machina Races
K9 Edition
games.about:
In the not too distant future where the dust has yet to settle on Mars comes the sustainable future of Grey Hound racing, ‘Robodogs’.

Pick your champion and watch them race over and over in breath-taking 3D, where each champion K9 tests their varying attributes and styles against one another.

The virtual race is live rendered with digital 3D action and RNG based.

Our contests support all the established markets (including Win, Forecast, Reverse Forecast, Tricast and Reverse Tricast).

Our virtual contests are high frequency, with a new race every 2 to 3 minutes, a 24/7 dedicated channel and seamless odds integration. The game logic behind each virtual race is fully adaptable to regulatory frameworks.

games.title:
Machina Races
CyberRaces
games.about:
Pick your winner for a fast-paced single or multiple circuit virtual speedway contest. Fast paced 360-degree photo-real track environment with straight out of Hollywood animated speed machines and dynamic race monitor with live overlay of competitor positions – CyberRaces.
The virtual race is live rendered with digital 3D action and RNG based.

Our contests support all the established markets (including Win, Forecast, Reverse Forecast, Tricast and Reverse Tricast).

Our virtual contests are high frequency, with a new race every 2 to 3 minutes, a 24/7 dedicated channel and seamless odds integration. The game logic behind each virtual race is fully adaptable to regulatory frameworks.

games.title: Chase A Crab
games.about:
